text: tatha ( hamane vash mein kar diya) sulaimaan[1] ke lie vaayu ko. usaka praatah chalana ek maheene ka tatha sandhya ka chalana ek maheene ka[2] hota tha tatha hamane baha diye usake lie taambe ke srot tatha kuchh jinn kaaryarat the usake samaksh, usake paalanahaar kee anumati se tatha unamen se jo phirega hamaare aadesh se, to ham chakhaayenge[3] use bhadakatee agni kee yaatana
